userIdInfo.title: User ID
userIdInfo.desc: Select the username you'd like to use for your Verizon login.

passwordInfo.title: Password
passwordInfo.desc: Pick a password to use with your Verizon login.

accountPinInfo.title: Account PIN
accountPinInfo.desc: Set a PIN number to verify your identity when calling customer care. This is different than your voicemail PIN and will become the primary means of verification when you or an Account Manager contacts us.

questionInfo.title: Security Question
questionInfo.desc: Choose a security question to verify identity when logging in from a new device.
